name: Sea To Summit X Mug 480ml
description: This compact mug takes up almost no room in your pack. Sea to Summit’s X line pairs supple food-grade silicone with food-safe nylon to create a collapsible mug that's easy to clean after you drain the last drop of your morning coffee.Easy-to-pack collapsible design.Supple food-grade silicone doesn’t transfer taste, resists high heat, and is easy to clean.Nylon ring gives the mug structure for easy drinking.Microwave and dishwasher safe.Dimensions: collapsed 11 x 1.5cm, open 11 x 8.5cm.
